prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a spiral shell and a vibrant blue tentacle.
I want an ancient-looking creature that resembles a mollusk with a golden shell.
Generate a playful aquatic Pokemon with bright colors and big expressive eyes.
Make a small Pokemon that has a unique shell pattern and lives in the ocean.
Imagine a fossil Pokemon that looks cute and has a friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a shelled creature into a larger aquatic form.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in underwater environments and has a soft body.
